tf_idf_bigrams <- bigrams %>%
  count(id, bigram) %>% 
  bind_tf_idf(bigram, id, n) %>% 
  bind_log_odds(bigram, id, n) %>% 
  arrange(desc(tf_idf)) %>% 
  left_join(rw %>% 
              select(id, source), 
            by = "id") %>% 
  filter(bigram %out% c("million people", "humanitarian assistance")) %>% 
  rename(word = bigram)
